Name: Venus-Seal
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Bulbasaur, Ivysaur, and Venusaur.  Swap a Venus-Claw and a Venus-Fang for a Venus-Seal at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
